name: Crypto Trading UI Kit | FrontDEX v4
description:
Free Trading UI Kit by Openware


Looking for a free complete cryptocurrency exchange template design?


FrontDEX is an all-inclusive frontend crypto UI design kit for a crypto trading brokerage landing, crypto exchange platform, crypto wallet applications and NFT marketplaces.


  • 40+ UI Screens
  • 100+ UI Elements
  • With the React JS Library
  • Mobile & Desktop Interfaces
  • Design System Included


Trading Components:

  • Deposit withdrawal
  • Tickers and markets selector
  • Candle sticks
  • Orderbooks
  • Market Orders
  • Limit Orders
  • Metamask connection
  • Login form and KYC
  • Wallets


FrontDEX Crypto UI/UX Design Kit natively supports OpenDAX v4 open-source crypto brokerage software with global liquidity and shared order books provided by the Yellow Network.


React library WEB SDK working with this UI Kit:

https://web-sdk.openware.com/?path=/story/getting-started--page


FrontDEX Crypto UI/UX Design Kit is available on Figma:

https://www.figma.com/community/file/1081520624421222872


Feel free to leave feedback, and don't forget to follow Openware to get lots of awesome free tools for crypto apps development!


Want to collaborate with Openware on crypto trading platform development?

Shoot your business inquiry to hello@openware.com
